does anyone else have this problem?

when I turn on ultra quality shaders, everything flashes this yellow color. also, I can't get any grass to show up or anything like that. It's very frusterating. I have tried resetting the settings, taking off all my mods besides parallax, reinstalling parallax, but nothing fixes this, or shows grass on kerbin or anything.
how do I get grass, flowers, and other ground cover to show up? all kerbin has is your trees!

18 minutes ago, NITRO-NINJA said:

how do I get grass, flowers, and other ground cover to show up? all kerbin has is your trees!

Make sure your terrain quality is set to High in the main menu, and that your Terrain Shader Quality is set to High or Ultra.

well, I got grass for the first time with high terrain detail (I am so happy that problem was so easy to fix!), but the ultra shaders are still causing this flashing yellow stuff everywhere.
Hello! Any idea what's wrong? Scatter objects are flashing..

9 minutes ago, Vl3d said:

Hello! Any idea what's wrong? Scatter objects are flashing..

This happens when you use the wrong antialiasing type with hdr + bloom from tufx.  I recommend turning off antialiasing in scatterer and the stock game options and use temporal antialiasing in tufx instead.

13 minutes ago, JonnyOThan said:

This happens when you use the wrong antialiasing type with hdr + bloom from tufx.  I recommend turning off antialiasing in scatterer and the stock game options and use temporal antialiasing in tufx instead.

Thank you! Turning off stock AA fixed the problem. Although I might just remove TUFX.
how do i get it to work with 7.8x rescale? it works but all the scatters are sparse
i'm having ice around the kSC, i am running jnsq but don't know if that's got anything to do with it?

So my Minmus still won't show the scatters, but does appear to load them in the log.

@GameslinxYou've mentioned a couple times to delete settings.cfg. Are you takling about the one in the root KSP folder? As I did so and no change. Should I just reinstall the plugin again and see what happens?

The only errors I see are lots of : 

[ERR 00:58:47.197] Material doesn't have a texture property '_DispTex'

But this is true for scatters that do display normally. Suggestions welcome!

Edit: Literally reinstalled KSP and all mods to bring it to stock and still nothing on Minmus?!

Second edit: I think? I found the issue, see below:

Turns out your system doesn't like when minimumSubdivision at the body level matches that of a scatter. So by default, the stock config for Minmus sets that value to 7 for all cases. But if I set that value to 6 instead of 7 at the body level, e.g.: 

ParallaxScatters
{
	body = Minmus
	minimumSubdivision = 6
	Scatter

Suddenly everything works!

What other things were broken? I've had no trouble with JNSQ itself on 1.12. If planets look wrong or you're getting a weird lingering motion blur effect (both issues I've had recently), you're using the wrong version of Scatterer and need to revert back to 0.772.

Did the game load for you at all with these Parallax configs for JNSQ? The reason I ask that is because it doesn't load at all for me, it gets stuck forever on a loading screen after mods and patches are loaded but before reaching the title screen.

The colour is a Kopernicus issue. There's a patch called "colourfix" that you can download separately from Kopernicus releases on Github, and put in your GameData folder.

Also, what version of Parallax were you using when you tested the JNSQ patch? I'm trying to figure out why it's not loading for me, and I don't know how to diagnose issues from log files so I'm basically just dependent on guesswork at this point until someone can provide me with a concrete answer.

is there parallax for rss>???????????????????????????????????? (anwser fast i want to apollo 11 for all mankind)
When i try to boot the game up, it says that shaderbank cfd is missing. Why?

First attempt at using this high mod with a great reputation, downloaded it this morning but have the same problems as Ian John and septemberWaves:

- tells me I am missing shaderbank cfd

- doesnt load the game, just stays on loading screen forever.

Probably related - that unzipping the Parallax_ScatterTextures file will create a Parallax_StockTextures folder, and not an expected Parallax_ScatterTextures folder.

=====

Edit - got now, the installation instructions are wrong on both the github page and also the InstallationInstructions.txt

When they say "Move the ... Parallax_ScatterTextures folders to your install's GameData folder", what they really mean is "Merge the contents of the new Parallax_StockTextures folder with the existing Parallax_StockTextures folder."
